channel.title: A World of Beliefs
channel.description:
I started this just today and I felt like sharing chapter 1 with you for some feedback. This book is entitled [i]A World of Beliefs[/i] and is created to formulate all my ideas regarding anything connected with beliefs in the common world. I don't know how long this book is going to be, but hopefully it will cover every angle that someone can view it from, as that's really what the book's all about.
So, if you are at all interested, please read and comment.
[url=http://docs.google.com/Doc?id=dd7w7jsd_8dtn66zgv]Chapter 1 -- What is a Belief?[/url]

item.title: A World of Beliefs
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I started this just today and I felt like sharing chapter 1 with you for some feedback. This book is entitled A World of Beliefs and is created to formulate all my ideas regarding anything connected with beliefs in the common world. I don’t know how long this book is going to be, but hopefully it will cover every angle that someone can view it from, as that’s really what the book’s all about.

So, if you are at all interested, please read and comment.

Chapter 1 – What is a Belief?
